data.text:
When Sarah Vaughan was born in 1730, in Charles City County, Virginia, United States, her father, Rabley Vaughan, was 32 and her mother, Mary Cocke, was 20. She married Brothers Finch about 1750, in Virginia, British Colonial America. They were the parents of at least 2 sons and 5 daughters. She died in 1807, in her hometown, at the age of 77.

Do you know Sarah? Do you have a story about her that you would like to share? Sign In or Create a FREE Account
